revised_title: Torsional Rigidity of Quartz Fibres and its Temperature Coefficient
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to determine the modulus of torsional rigidity of quartz fibers and its temperature coefficient. They used an improved method of timing by coincidences and a new suspension material for the fibers. The results showed a linear relation between rigidity and temperature, and the mean value of the temperature coefficient of the modulus was calculated.
